cont.entity_a: Autofocus stopped working in less than a year. Autofocus is problematic in less than bright light. Autofocus is slow. Autofocus can be noisy and inconsistent at 300mm. Autofocus can be slow, but picture quality is generally good.
Seller was not authorized for warranty repairs. Tamron warranty repair service is quick, but shipping is at the user's expense. Comes with a lens hood and a 6-year warranty.
Telephoto macro function is appreciated. Macro function is great. Macro setting works well for close-up shots.
Error occurred saying the contacts were dirty despite being clean.

Build.comm: The lens is solid and built well.

cont.entity_a: Solid build and includes a lens cap. Slightly heavy compared to kit lenses.
cont.entity_b: Heavy and not suitable as a 'walk around' lens. Well built and comfortable to handle.

cont.entity_a: Picture quality is impressive. Produces sharp images up to about 280mm. Offers a good balance of quality and price for beginners. Great lens for the price, especially for non-professional use. Provides excellent value for money.
cont.entity_b: Tack sharp with brilliant color and gorgeous bokeh. Super-sharp and works well in low light with camera stabilization. Images are rendered beautifully with amazing bokeh. Fast with accurate colors and tack sharp. Heavy lens that delivers stunning images. Outstanding bokeh with brighter colors and sharper images. Regarded as the best lens Sony makes.

cont.entity_a: Lens is noisy and slow, not suitable for astrophotography.
Focal ring is loose, causing lens creep when pointed upward.
Not recommended for fast-moving sports due to slow focus.
cont.entity_b: Ideal for portrait work and astrophotography.

cont.entity_a: Lightweight and less expensive compared to Canon lenses.
cont.entity_b: Not suitable as a 'walk around' lens.

cont.entity_a: Lens lacks image stabilization. Requires a tripod for low-light conditions due to lack of stabilization.
cont.entity_b: Perfect for hand-held low light photography with built-in stabilization.
Faster and sharper than Canon and Nikon lenses in this focal length.
